Content.Text:
<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
At the General Store I sell all sorts of
useful things, like seeds and other
items you'll need for farming.
<PAGE>
I also make <RED>bouquets</RED> if you bring me
lots of flowers.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The General Store is open on <BLUE>Monday,</BLUE>
<BLUE>Tuesday, Thursday, Friday and Saturday</BLUE>.
We're closed on <BLUE>Wednesday and Sunday</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
If you need anything during working
hours you can ring that <RED>bell</RED> you see in
front of you there.
